property.name: Interoperability_Index
property.description:
Type: "C",
Exif interoperability spec (i.e. R98).

property.name: Interoperability_Version
property.description:
Type: "C",
Exit interoperability version number (0100 means version 1.0)

property.name: New_Subfile_Type
property.description:
Type: "C",
General indication of kind of data contained in subfile.

property.name: Image_Width
property.description:
Type: "N",
Pixels width for the image.

property.name: Image_Length
property.description:
Type: "N",
Pixel Height for the image.

property.name: Bits_Per_Sample
property.description:
Type: "N",
Number of bits per image sample (i.e. 8 is normal for 24 bit RGB - 3 samples * 8 bits per sample = 24 bit)

property.name: Compression
property.description:
Type: "N",
Compression scheme (i.e. JPEG=6)

property.name: Photometric_Interpretation
property.description:
Type: "N",
Pixel composition - ignored for JPEG

property.name: Fill_Order
property.description:
Type: "C",
Order of bits in a byte.

property.name: Document_Name
property.description:
Type: "C",
Name of document (for scanned image)

property.name: Image_Description
property.description:
Type: "C",
User comment attached to image.

property.name: Make
property.description:
Type: "C",
Camera/scanner manufacturer (default none)

property.name: Model
property.description:
Type: "C",
Camera/scanner model (default none)

property.name: Strip_Offsets
property.description:
Type: "C",
offset of strip (container for rows) - not applicable for JPEG

property.name: Orientation
property.description:
Type: "N",
Orientation of pixels (rows or columns)

property.name: Samples_Per_Pixel
property.description:
Type: "N",
Number of components per pixel - i.e. RGB is 3.

property.name: Rows_Per_Strip
property.description:
Type: "C",
Number of rows in an image strip

property.name: Strip_Byte_Counts
property.description:
Type: "C",
Number of bytes in each dtrip

property.name: X_Resolution
property.description:
Type: "C",
Number of horizontal pixels per resolution unit

property.name: Y_Resolution
property.description:
Type: "C",
Number of vertical pixels per resolution unit

property.name: Planar_Configuration
property.description:
Type: "N",
For non jpeg - are pixels planar or chunky, 1 is chunky.

property.name: Resolution_Unit
property.description:
Type: "N",
Units of resolution (#2 is inches)

property.name: Transfer_Function
property.description:
Type: "C",
Transfer Function for image (ignored when ColorSpace is defined)

property.name: Software
property.description:
Type: "C",
Software for Camera or Scanner

property.name: Date_Time
property.description:
Type: "C",
Timestamp of image creation

property.name: Artist
property.description:
Type: "C",
Camera owner/Image Creator name.

property.name: White_Point
property.description:
Type: "C",
Describe the iimage white point (unused if ColorSpace is defined)

property.name: Primary_Chromaticities
property.description:
Type: "C",
Specify the three primary colors (unused if ColorSpace is defined)

property.name: Sub_Ifds
property.description:
Type: "C",
Added by Adobe to allow nested TIFFS

property.name: Transfer_Range
property.description:
Type: "C",
Expand the range for the transfer function (unused if ColorSpace is defined)

property.name: Jpeg_Proc
property.description:
Type: "C",
Jpeg image compression procedure used for image.

property.name: Jpeg_Interchange_Format
property.description:
Type: "N",
Offset of thumbnail for JPEG

property.name: Jpeg_Interchange_Format_Length
property.description:
Type: "N",
Number of bytes in JPEG thumbnail image.

property.name: Ycbcr_Coefficients
property.description:
Type: "C",
Coefficients for transfering RGB values to yCbCr image data.

property.name: Ycbcr_Sub_Sampling
property.description:
Type: "N",
Sampling Ratio chromanance to luminance.

property.name: Ycbcr_Positioning
property.description:
Type: "N",
Position chromanance to luminance relation.

property.name: Reference_Black_White
property.description:
Type: "C",
Reference black value and white value.

property.name: Xml_Packet
property.description:
Type: "C",
XPM Metadata (Adobe)

property.name: Related_Image_File_Format
property.description:
Type: "C",
File format of the image.

property.name: Related_Image_Width
property.description:
Type: "C",
Width of the image

property.name: Related_Image_Length
property.description:
Type: "C",
Height of the image.

property.name: Cfa_Repeat_Pattern_Dim
property.description:
Type: "C",
Two values - minumum rows and columns to define patterns of the color filter array.

property.name: Cfa_Pattern
property.description:
Type: "C",
Indicates the color filter array for the image sensor.

property.name: Battery_Level
property.description:
Type: "C",
Battery level as a fraction or string.

property.name: Copyright
property.description:
Type: "C",
Copyright information for image.

property.name: Exposure_Time
property.description:
Type: "C",
Exposure time in seconds.

property.name: Fnumber
property.description:
Type: "C",
FStop number.

property.name: Iptc_Naa
property.description:
Type: "C",
IPTC/NAXX record.

property.name: Image_Resources
property.description:
Type: "C",
Adobe Photoshop embedded information.

property.name: Exif_Ifd_Pointer
property.description: Type: "N", Numeric Exif_Ifd_Pointer property

property.name: Inter_Color_Profile
property.description:
Type: "C",
Contains InterColor Consortuim (ICC) format color space characterization.

property.name: Exposure_Program
property.description:
Type: "N",
How the camera sets the exposure.

property.name: Spectral_Sensitivity
property.description:
Type: "C",
Indicates the sprectal sensitivity of each channel of the camera

property.name: Gps_Info_Ifd_Pointer
property.description: Type: "N". Numeric Gps_Info_Ifd_Pointer property

property.name: Iso_Speed_Ratings
property.description:
Type: "N",
Indicates the ISO Speed and latitude of the Camera.

property.name: Oecf
property.description:
Type: "C",
Opto-Electric Conversion Function.

property.name: Time_Zone_Offset
property.description:
Type: "C",
Time zone used by the camera clock.

property.name: Exif_Version
property.description: Type: "C", String Exif_Version property

property.name: Date_Time_Original
property.description:
Type: "C",
Original timestamp for image.

property.name: Date_Time_Digitized
property.description:
Type: "C",
The date and time the image was stored as digital data.

property.name: Components_Configuration
property.description:
Type: "C",
Information concerning compressed data order.

property.name: Compressed_Bits_Per_Pixel
property.description:
Type: "C",
Units per compressed pixel.

property.name: Shutter_Speed_Value
property.description:
Type: "C",
Shutter speed in APEX setting units.

property.name: Aperture_Value
property.description:
Type: "C",
Lens Aperature in APEX.

property.name: Brightness_Value
property.description:
Type: "C",
APEX Brightness value

property.name: Exposure_Bias_Value
property.description:
Type: "C",
APEX Exposure bias.

property.name: Max_Aperture_Value
property.description:
Type: "C",
The smallest F number of the lens (APEx value).

property.name: Subject_Distance
property.description:
Type: "C",
Distance from subject in meters.

property.name: Metering_Mode
property.description:
Type: "N",
Metering mode for camera.

property.name: Light_Source
property.description:
Type: "N",
Light source for the photograph.

property.name: Flash
property.description:
Type: "N",
Image was taken with Flash.

property.name: Focal_Length
property.description:
Type: "C",
Focal length of the lens.

property.name: Subject_Area
property.description:
Type: "N",
Location and area of subject in scene.

property.name: Tiff_Ep_Standard_Id
property.description:
Type: "C",
TIFF/EP standard version of file (4 characters)

property.name: Maker_Note
property.description:
Type: "C",
Manufacture or Exif writer specific comments.

property.name: User_Comment
property.description:
Type: "C",
Exif user defined comment.

property.name: Sub_Sec_Time
property.description:
Type: "C",
Smaller time increments (extends the DateTime field)

property.name: Sub_Sec_Time_Original
property.description:
Type: "C",
Smaller time increments (extends the DateTimeOriginal field)

property.name: Sub_Sec_Time_Digitized
property.description:
Type: "C",
Smaller time increments (extends the DateTimeDigitized field)

property.name: Xp_Title
property.description:
Type: "C",
Windows image title.

property.name: Xp_Comment
property.description:
Type: "C",
Window image comment.

property.name: Xp_Author
property.description:
Type: "C",
Windows author (generally the user)

property.name: Xp_Keywords
property.description:
Type: "C",
Windows keywords (tagging)

property.name: Xp_Subject
property.description:
Type: "C",
Windows subject.

property.name: Flash_Pix_Version
property.description:
Type: "C",
Flashpix version (applies to FPXR files)

property.name: Color_Space
property.description:
Type: "N",
The colorspace used for uncalibrated data.

property.name: Pixel_X_Dimension
property.description:
Type: "N",
Width for compressed image.

property.name: Pixel_Y_Dimension
property.description:
Type: "N",
Height for compressed image.

property.name: Related_Sound_File
property.description:
Type: "C",
Name of a related sound file (no path)

property.name: Interoperability_Ifd_Pointer
property.description: Type: "N", Numeric Interoperability_Ifd_Pointer property

property.name: Flash_Energy
property.description:
Type: "C",
Strobe energy in Mean Candle Power Seconds BCPS..

property.name: Spatial_Frequency_Response
property.description:
Type: "C",
Direction of the image width and image height and diagonal

property.name: Focal_Plane_X_Resolution
property.description:
Type: "C",
Number of pixels per direction X on camera focal plane.

property.name: Focal_Plane_Y_Resolution
property.description:
Type: "C",
Number of pixels per direction Y on camera focal plane.

property.name: Focal_Plane_Resolution_Unit
property.description:
Type: "N",
Units of measure for Focal_Plane_X_Resolution and Focal_Plane_Y_Resolution

property.name: Subject_Location
property.description:
Type: "N",
Indicate the location of the subject within the scene.

property.name: Exposure_Index
property.description:
Type: "C",
Exposure indxe of the camera or scanner when the image was aquired.

property.name: Sensing_Method
property.description:
Type: "N",
Indictates the type of image sensor used.

property.name: File_Source
property.description:
Type: "C",
Source for creating the digitized file.

property.name: Scene_Type
property.description:
Type: "C",
Scene type (directly photographed = 1 )

property.name: New_Cfa_Pattern
property.description: Type: "C", String New_Cfa_Pattern property

property.name: Custom_Rendered
property.description:
Type: "N",
Indicates that image processing was performed on the image.

property.name: Exposure_Mode
property.description:
Type: "N",
Exposure mode (i.e. auto bracketing is an example)

property.name: White_Balance
property.description:
Type: "N",
White balance for the image.

property.name: Digital_Zoom_Ratio
property.description:
Type: "C",
What digital zoom ration was used (0 indicates no digital zoom).

property.name: Focal_Length_In_35Mm_Film
property.description:
Type: "N",
Focal length Compared to a 35mm camera.

property.name: Scene_Capture_Type
property.description:
Type: "N",
Type of scene captured by the image.

property.name: Gain_Control
property.description:
Type: "N",
Image gain adjustment.

property.name: Contrast
property.description:
Type: "N",
Direction of contrast applied by image processing.

property.name: Saturation
property.description:
Type: "N",
Direction of saturation applied by image processing.

property.name: Sharpness
property.description:
Type: "N",
Direction of sharpness applied by image processing.

property.name: Device_Setting_Description
property.description:
Type: "C",
Picture taking conditions.

property.name: Subject_Distance_Range
property.description:
Type: "N",
Range of the subject of the image.

property.name: Image_Unique_Id
property.description:
Type: "C",
Globally unique identifier for image

property.name: Gamma
property.description: Type: "C", String Gamma property

property.name: Print_Image_Matching
property.description: Type: "C", String Print_Image_Matching property

property.name: Padding
property.description: Type: "C", String Padding property

property.name: Gps
property.description:
Type: "GPSExifInfo",
GPS data for image.

methodref.name: GetThumbnail
methodref.description: Get the binary data for the thumbnail.

methodref.name: HasThumbnail
methodref.description: A thumbnail for the image is stored in the exif data.

methodref.name: LoadExifData
methodref.description: Load Exif information from an image file.

methodref.name: SaveExifData
methodref.description: Save Exif information to an image file.

methodref.name: SetThumbnail
methodref.description: Override the thumbnail stored in the exif data.

page.original:
Helper::ExifInfo Class Properties Property Type Description Interoperability_Index C Exif interoperability spec (i.e. R98). Interoperability_Version C Exit interoperability version number (0100 means version 1.0) New_Subfile_Type C General indication of kind of data contained in subfile. Image_Width N Pixels width for the image. Image_Length N Pixel Height for the image. Bits_Per_Sample N Number of bits per image sample (i.e. 8 is normal for 24 bit RGB - 3 samples * 8 bits per sample = 24 bit) Compression N Compression scheme (i.e. JPEG=6) Photometric_Interpretation N Pixel composition - ignored for JPEG Fill_Order C Order of bits in a byte. Document_Name C Name of document (for scanned image) Image_Description C User comment attached to image. Make C Camera/scanner manufacturer (default none) Model C Camera/scanner model (default none) Strip_Offsets C offset of strip (container for rows) - not applicable for JPEG Orientation N Orientation of pixels (rows or columns) Samples_Per_Pixel N Number of components per pixel - i.e. RGB is 3. Rows_Per_Strip C Number of rows in an image strip . Strip_Byte_Counts C Number of bytes in each dtrip X_Resolution C Number of horizontal pixels per resolution unit Y_Resolution C Number of vertical pixels per resolution unit Planar_Configuration N For non jpeg - are pixels planar or chunky - 1 is chunky. Resolution_Unit N Units of resolution (#2 is inches) Transfer_Function C Transfer Function for image (ignored when ColorSpace is defined) Software C Software for Camera or Scanner Date_Time C Timestamp of image creation Artist C Camera owner/Image Creator name. White_Point C Describe the iimage white point (unused if ColorSpace is defined) Primary_Chromaticities C Specify the three primary colors (unused if ColorSpace is defined) Sub_Ifds C Added by Adobe to allow nested TIFFS Transfer_Range C Expand the range for the transfer function (unused if ColorSpace is defined) Jpeg_Proc C Jpeg image compression procedure used for image. Jpeg_Interchange_Format N Offset of thumbnail for JPEG Jpeg_Interchange_Format_Length N Number of bytes in JPEG thumbnail image. Ycbcr_Coefficients C Coefficients for transfering RGB values to yCbCr image data. Ycbcr_Sub_Sampling N Sampling Ratio chromanance to luminance. Ycbcr_Positioning N Position chromanance to luminance relation. Reference_Black_White C Reference black value and white value. Xml_Packet C XPM Metadata (Adobe) Related_Image_File_Format C File format of the image. Related_Image_Width C Width of the image Related_Image_Length C Height of the image. Cfa_Repeat_Pattern_Dim C Two values - minumum rows and columns to define patterns of the color filter array. Cfa_Pattern C Indicates the color filter array for the image sensor. Battery_Level C Battery level as a fraction or string. Copyright C Copyright information for image. Exposure_Time C Exposure time in seconds. Fnumber C FStop number. Iptc_Naa C IPTC/NAXX record. Image_Resources C Adobe Photoshop embedded information. Exif_Ifd_Pointer N
Inter_Color_Profile C Contains InterColor Consortuim (ICC) format color space characterization. Exposure_Program N How the camera sets the exposure. Spectral_Sensitivity C Indicates the sprectal sensitivity of each channel of the camera Gps_Info_Ifd_Pointer N
Iso_Speed_Ratings N Indicates the ISO Speed and latitude of the Camera. Oecf C Opto-Electric Conversion Function. Time_Zone_Offset C Time zone used by the camera clock. Exif_Version C
Date_Time_Original C Original timestamp for image. Date_Time_Digitized C The date and time the image was stored as digital data. Components_Configuration C Information concerning compressed data order. Compressed_Bits_Per_Pixel C Units per compressed pixel. Shutter_Speed_Value C Shutter speed in APEX setting units. Aperture_Value C Lens Aperature in APEX. Brightness_Value C APEX Brightness value Exposure_Bias_Value C APEX Exposure bias. Max_Aperture_Value C The smallest F number of the lens (APEx value). Subject_Distance C Distance from subject in meters. Metering_Mode N Metering mode for camera. Light_Source N Light source for the photograph. Flash N Image was taken with Flash. Focal_Length C Focal length of the lens. Subject_Area N Location and area of subject in scene. Tiff_Ep_Standard_Id C TIFF/EP standard version of file (4 characters) Maker_Note C Manufacture or Exif writer specific comments. User_Comment C Exif user defined comment. Sub_Sec_Time C Smaller time increments (extends the DateTime field) Sub_Sec_Time_Original C Smaller time increments (extends the DateTimeOriginal field) Sub_Sec_Time_Digitized C Smaller time increments (extends the DateTimeDigitized field) Xp_Title C Windows image title. Xp_Comment C Window image comment. Xp_Author C Windows author (generally the user) Xp_Keywords C Windows keywords (tagging) Xp_Subject C Windows subject. Flash_Pix_Version C Flashpix version (applies to FPXR files) Color_Space N The colorspace used for uncalibrated data. Pixel_X_Dimension N Width for compressed image. Pixel_Y_Dimension N Height for compressed image. Related_Sound_File C Name of a related sound file (no path) Interoperability_Ifd_Pointer N
Flash_Energy C Strobe energy in Mean Candle Power Seconds BCPS.. Spatial_Frequency_Response C Direction of the image width and image height and diagonal Focal_Plane_X_Resolution C Number of pixels per direction X on camera focal plane. Focal_Plane_Y_Resolution C Number of pixels per direction Y on camera focal plane. Focal_Plane_Resolution_Unit N Units of measure for Focal_Plane_X_Resolution and Focal_Plane_Y_Resolution Subject_Location N Indicate the location of the subject within the scene. Exposure_Index C Exposure indxe of the camera or scanner when the image was aquired. Sensing_Method N Indictates the type of image sensor used. File_Source C Source for creating the digitized file. Scene_Type C Scene type (directly photographed = 1 ) New_Cfa_Pattern C
Custom_Rendered N Indicates that image processing was performed on the image. Exposure_Mode N Exposure mode (i.e. auto bracketing is an example) White_Balance N White balance for the image. Digital_Zoom_Ratio C What digital zoom ration was used (0 indicates no digital zoom). Focal_Length_In_35Mm_Film N Focal length Compared to a 35mm camera. Scene_Capture_Type N Type of scene captured by the image. Gain_Control N Image gain adjustment. Contrast N Direction of contrast applied by image processing. Saturation N Direction of saturation applied by image processing. Sharpness N Direction of sharpness applied by image processing. Device_Setting_Description C Picture taking conditions. Subject_Distance_Range N Range of the subject of the image. Image_Unique_Id C Globally unique identifier for image Gamma C
Print_Image_Matching C
Padding C
Gps GPSExifInfo GPS data for image.
Methods Method Description PUBLIC LoadExifData AS L (imageName AS C)Load Exif information from an image file. PUBLIC SaveExifData AS L (imageName AS C)Save Exif information to an image file. PUBLIC GetThumbnail AS B ()Get the binary data for the thumbnail. PUBLIC HasThumbnail AS L ()A thumbnail for the image is stored in the exif data. PUBLIC SetThumbnail AS V (data AS B)Override the thumbnail stored in the exif data.
See Also Helper?
